extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Occurance>
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA. User: Timo Homburg Date: 03.12.13 Time: 17:42 Class for modelling an occurance instance containing a relative and abolute word position as well as its amount.
